alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Owyhee (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 07 at 6:02PM MDT until June 07 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Southwestern Elmore County in southwestern Idaho... Central Owyhee County in southwestern Idaho... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 600 PM MDT, dust was reported along a line extending from 7 miles near Grand View to 6 miles southwest of Oreana, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * Interstate 84 and Mud Flat Road will be affected. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
